name: Amaury De Souza
bio: Amaury de Souza is an esteemed real estate professional affiliated with Fortune Christie's International Real Estate, recognized for his commitment to helping families find their dream homes. With nearly two decades of experience, Amaury has established himself as a respected figure in the Brickell real estate scene. His professional journey began in 2014 when a friend identified his natural talent for connecting individuals with their ideal properties, a talent he has since honed and perfected. Amaury's comprehensive background encompasses both residential and commercial real estate. While doing Real Estate Amaury had a role as a mortgage broker but quickly learned that he wanted to stay with Real Estate only. Amaury notable achievements include successfully navigating a significant commercial real estate transaction, highlighting his exceptional negotiation skills and profound market understanding. Beyond his professional life, Amaury actively engages in social activities and forging meaningful connections. Committed to continuous learning, he has completed various courses in commercial real estate to remain at the forefront of industry trends. Amaury de Souza is your trusted advisor, known for his professionalism, expertise, and dedication. Whether you're in search of your dream home or navigating the complexities of commercial real estate, Amaury is your reliable resource. Contact him today to experience the tailored, high-quality service that sets him apart in the competitive Brickell real estate market. name: Amanda Vizquel
bio: Amanda's professional journey in real estate has taken her through various roles, including working with developers in the past. This experience has given her a deep understanding of new construction, enabling her to guide clients through the intricacies of buying or investing in newly built properties. Her ability to speak English, Portuguese, and Spanish fluently, combined with her experience in the field and passion for helping her clients find their perfect home, makes her a valuable asset for individuals seeking to navigate the real estate market in diverse communities. With a Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Amanda possesses a unique analytical perspective providing clients with a comprehensive understanding of the economic aspects of their real estate transactions. In an ever-evolving real estate market, Amanda has continually expanded her knowledge base to stay current with the latest market trends. She believes in empowering her clients with up-to-date insights and helping them make informed choices in their real estate ventures. She understands that finding the perfect home is a deeply personal endeavor, and she tailors each transaction to meet her client's unique needs and aspirations. Whether you're buying, selling, or investing in real estate, Amanda is the trusted partner you need. With a wealth of experience, a strong educational foundation, and a dedication to personalized service, Amanda is committed to guiding you through every step of your real estate journey. name: Alexandra Escudero
bio: With more than 30 years at Fortune Christie’s International Real Estate, Alexandra Escudero brings a proven track record in Miami’s luxury market. A consistent Fortune Circle Award top producer since 2015, she is recognized for her strong negotiation skills, strategic approach, and deep understanding of both residential and commercial real estate. Alexandra works extensively with high-net-worth clients from Europe and Latin America, offering a global network that enhances exposure and brings qualified buyers to every listing. Her clients value her honesty, discretion, and the confidence they feel throughout the process. Clients return to her repeatedly because they know they are in capable hands. Fluent in Spanish, English, and Portuguese, Alexandra navigates Miami’s multicultural market with ease. She has been featured in publications such as Brickell Magazine for her professionalism, work ethic, and market expertise. Above all, Alexandra approaches each property as if it were her own, providing clear guidance, diligent research, and a level of service that protects her clients’ interests at every step. name: Alex Chapman
bio: Alex Chapman is a globally recognized real estate broker and proud member of the prestigious Christie’s International Real Estate Masters Circle, an elite group representing the top agents across the worldwide Christie’s network. With more than 18 years of award-winning experience, Alex represents Fortune Christie’s International Real Estate in Southeast Florida. Before expanding his business to Florida, Alex built a highly successful luxury practice in the Midwest, giving him a strong foundation of market expertise and long-standing client relationships that now extend to the Florida market. Today, he specializes in high-end homes, new construction, waterfront properties, and strategic relocations into Southeast Florida. Known for sharp negotiation skills, elevated marketing, and a client-first approach, Alex delivers a seamless and highly personalized real estate experience for buyers, sellers, and investors. Trusted for his professionalism and integrity, he combines deep local knowledge with global reach to produce exceptional results across the competitive South Florida market. name: Adrian Benito Gonzalez
bio: Meet Adrian Gonzalez, your trusted Miami real estate expert, born and raised in the vibrant heart of the city. With over a decade of invaluable experience in the local market, Adrian has consistently exemplified a passion for delivering unparalleled results to his valued clients. Having facilitated transactions totaling an impressive $500 million, Adrian's track record speaks volumes about his exceptional skills and expertise in the industry. As a testament to his unwavering commitment to excellence, he has been recognized as a top producer for five consecutive years and, a prestigious accolade bestowed upon only the most accomplished professionals in the field. For Adrian, real estate isn't just a profession; it's a deeply ingrained part of his identity. Growing up in Miami, he possesses an innate understanding of the city's unique neighborhoods, trends, and opportunities. This insight allows him to offer personalized guidance to clients, ensuring their needs and aspirations are met with precision. During Adrian's downtime, you can find him cruising the bay on his boat, indulging in his passion for fishing, or enjoying some friendly competition in outdoor sports. Above all, Adrian values the relationships he builds with his clients. He firmly believes that their needs, time, and success are paramount, and he approaches every transaction with unwavering dedication and a client-centric mindset. <!--td {border: 1px solid #cccccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}--> EXPLORE SINGULAR AND MEMORABLE LIFESTYLES Exclusive Development Portfolio Fortune International Group’s portfolio of owned and marketed properties offer extraordinary living experiences that elevate the concept of luxury living to new standards. bio: Adriana Brito brings more than 10 years of experience as a top producing real estate broker in South Florida with a global network of high net worth clients. A driven business woman, Adriana’s represented her clients in numerous deals in the luxury condo market selling nearly 100 units, establishing her as a leading producer with FIR. Starting at The Campins Company, nationally renowned for their “A” list roster of clientele including athletes, celebrities and entrepreneurs, provided Adriana with the skills set to successfully cultivate exceptional relationships. Her passion for real estate landed Adriana in working with Fortune Development Group as in-house at Brickell Heights and its successful sell out.Adriana has consistently been recognized as a Top Producer in both General Real Estate and Development Sales, with a combined total of $118 million in sales since 2013. Miami native, Adriana received her B.A. in Finance from FlU. name: Adam Elmer SR
bio: With over three decades of experience crafting exquisite custom homes, I have now embarked on a new journey as a distinguished realtor specializing in the Florida real estate market. My passion for design, attention to detail, and deep understanding of the real estate industry have seamlessly converged, allowing me to provide an unparalleled level of service to clients seeking their dream homes in the Sunshine State. Recognizing the synergies between my background in custom home construction and the intricacies of luxury real estate, I have seamlessly transitioned into the role of a trusted realtor. Armed with an innate sense of what constitutes luxury living and a keen eye for properties that possess exceptional value, I guide my clients through the dynamic Florida real estate market with finesse and expertise. Navigating the real estate market requires more than just market knowledge; it requires an ability to identify opportunities that align with each client's distinct vision. Drawing from my extensive experience in custom home building, I offer clients a unique advantage – the ability to envision the potential of a property beyond its current state, opening doors to transformations that suit their lifestyles. My journey as a realtor is marked by a commitment to delivering tailored experiences that mirror the bespoke homes I once crafted. With an unwavering dedication to my clients' aspirations as well as budget, I guide them through every step of the buying and selling process. The relationships I forge extend beyond transactions, evolving into lifelong connections built on trust, integrity, and shared achievements. My transition from custom home builder to luxury real estate expert represents a natural evolution rooted in a passion for bringing dreams to life. Armed with a profound understanding of design, construction, and the art of living luxuriously, I continue to redefine the Florida luxury real estate landscape, one client and one exceptional property at a time. Whether you're seeking to find your dream waterfront property, a luxurious golf course estate, or an exclusive beachfront retreat, I invite you to join me on this exciting journey, where your vision of the perfect luxury home meets the boundless opportunities of the Florida market. name: Adam Elmer
bio: Adam Elmer Jr., an esteemed professional in the residential real estate industry, stands as the co-founder of The Worth Group, a prominent entity powered by Fortune Christie's International Real Estate. With a career spanning over 12 years, he has garnered extensive experience and expertise in the field. Adam's journey in real estate began within a family deeply rooted in construction. His father, a general contractor who specialized in constructing new residential homes in Philadelphia, provided him with invaluable insights and exposure to the construction process. This background has equipped Adam with a unique advantage, allowing him to guide his clients through the intricacies of new construction buildouts and collaborate effectively with developers seeking to create, launch, and sell their projects. In his real estate endeavors, Adam Elmer Jr. embraces a professional concierge approach, ensuring that his clients receive personalized and attentive service. His profound understanding of the South Florida market, with a particular focus on Delray Beach and Boca Raton in Palm Beach County, further enhances his ability to cater to his clients' needs. Notably, Adam played a significant role in the successful launch of The Residences at Mandarin Oriental in Boca Raton, contributing to over $350 million in sales for the project. This achievement exemplifies his dedication, expertise, and ability to navigate the complexities of high-value real estate transactions. As a co-founder of The Worth Group, Adam Elmer Jr. specializes in New Construction residential sales. Demonstrating his exceptional skills and reputation, he remarkably secured contracts valued at over $50 million in the year 2022-2023 alone. These accomplishments further solidify his standing as a trusted and accomplished professional within the industry, as he continues to make significant contributions to the success of The Worth Group and the realm of residential real estate. In July 2023, Adam Elmer Jr., at the helm of The Worth Group, played a pivotal role in the establishment of Fortune International Realty's inaugural office in Boca Raton. This significant milestone marked the esteemed company's foray into Palm Beach County, signifying its expansion efforts within the vibrant South Florida region. Adam Elmer Jr. holds a deep sense of pride in his association with Fortune International Realty and its esteemed CEO, Edgardo Defortuna. The profound alignment between his professional pursuits and the company's visionary outlook fosters a remarkable synergy, underpinned by shared values and a thriving corporate culture that seamlessly resonates with his own work ethic. Among the notable endeavors passionately endorsed by The Worth Group and Adam Elmer Jr. is ORA by Casa Tua, an iconic high-rise development nestled in the heart of Brickell, Miami. This exceptional project stands as a testament to the team's unwavering commitment to excellence, as they wholeheartedly promote and showcase this remarkable residential masterpiece to discerning clients. With this latest venture, Adam Elmer Jr. and The Worth Group further solidify their influential position as key contributors to the growth and success of Fortune International Realty. Simultaneously, they play a significant role in elevating the real estate landscape in South Florida. Their unwavering dedication, profound expertise, and shared vision act as a powerful driving force behind their continued accomplishments within the industry. <!--td {border: 1px solid #cccccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}--> EXPLORE SINGULAR AND MEMORABLE LIFESTYLES Exclusive Development Portfolio Fortune International Group’s portfolio of owned and marketed properties offer extraordinary living experiences that elevate the concept of luxury living to new standards.
